mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile ( id, cancer_idx, stage_idx, profile_photo, intro, profile_yn, access_cnt) VALUES (#{id}, #{cancerIdx}, #{stageIdx}, #{profilePhoto}, #{intro}, #{profileYn}, #{accessCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, cancer_idx, stage_idx, profile_photo, intro, profile_yn, access_cnt FROM profile WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY access_cnt DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE profile SET profile_photo = #{profile_photo}, intro = #{intro}, profile_yn = #{profile_yn}, access_cnt = #{accessCnt} WHERE id = #{id}
